infos.value: What!? Muraga is leading his main army «Ruina» in pursuit of Oelde!?
Yes, Your Highness.
From their actions, it's safe to assume that Leonis has gone to seek Wezette's support.
Father. Aren't things moving a little too fast?
Hm...
Diving into war is exactly what Sadali and Muraga want.
Yet, it also presents the perfect opportunity to strike down our sworn enemy, Wezette...
What I cannot fathom is Muraga's intent. Why hasn't he informed us of his actions?
Perhaps it serves him better for us not to be there...
Or maybe...
Yes?
Father...forgive me. The ancient necklace you gave me for my wedding... Mont still has it.
Is Muraga aware of this?
He's surprisingly quick-witted. I wouldn't put it past him...
Hmph...
To make matters worse, Mont also has an ancient relic from Leonis.
So if Muraga were to crush Oelde's army...
He would then become the proud owner of two more ancient relics.
That would be unfortunate. We must prevent that from happening.
Leave it to me, Your Highness. My Lady.
Ah, Adelard and Salire.
Hm... Perhaps the second division, «Nitor», could prove valuable in this effort.
Very well, set out immediately.
Yes, Your Highness. You can count on us.
